r.d: Yaf is a PHP framework similar to zend framework, which is written in c and built as PHP extension
r.n: - Added Yaf_View_Simple::eval - Supported short_open_tag in Yaf_View_Simple - Fixed a potential segfault while alternately access two yaf application host in one machine - Improve the Yaf_Route_Static/Supervar::route logic - Fixed bug that 404 occurred if the request is prefix with more than one slash - Fixed bug that free NULL pointer in Yaf_Loader::registerLocalNameSpace
